Terms.title: Terms
Terms.your_account_description: To use TradeLens, you need to create an account. This allows you to:
Terms.your_account_description_2: Access your trading history and account settings.
Terms.our_services_description: TradeLens provides AI-powered stock trading insights and recommendations. Our services are for informational purposes only and should not be considered financial advice.
Terms.our_services_description_2: We don't guarantee the accuracy or reliability of any information provided through our platform.
Terms.your_conduct_description: Respect other users and don't engage in harmful behavior or interfere with the platform's functionality.
Terms.your_conduct_description_2: Activities, or using our platform to violate any laws.
Terms.intellectual_property_description: All content and functionality on TradeLens is owned by us or our licensors and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
Terms.intellectual_property_description_2: You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from our content without explicit permission.
Terms.disclaimers_description: Our services are provided 'as is' without any warranties. We don't guarantee that our services will be error-free, secure, or always available.
Terms.disclaimers_description_2: Trading stocks involves risk. We're not responsible for any financial losses you may incur based on our recommendations.
Terms.liability_description: To the extent permitted by law, we won't be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of our services.
Terms.liability_description_2: Our total liability for any claims is limited to the amount you've paid us in the past 12 months.
Terms.changes_description: We may update these terms at any time. We'll notify you of significant changes before they take effect. Your continued use of TradeLens after changes means you accept the new terms.
Terms.changes_description_2: Questions about these terms? Contact us at legal@tradelens.com or call +1 (555) 123-4567.
